name: PoF Kill Run
description:
Get yourself a spot for your weekly PoF clear.

**⚠️ This is a Kill Run, so you should have defeated all the bosses before and be comfortable in performing your role. ⚠️**

**Special jobs:**

🟣 **DPS (Portal)**
*W6:* Place `Mesmer Portals` at <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.

🟥 **DPS (Lamp)**
*W6:* Do the `Lamp` on your own at <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.

🔺**DPS (Pylon)**
*W7:* Do a `Pylon` at <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940> **Qadim the Peerless**.

🔻 **DPS (Kiter + Pylon)**
*W6:* Kite on <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.
*W7:* Do a `Pylon` at <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940> **Qadim the Peerless**.

🩸 **DPS (Epidemic + Pylon)**
*W5:* Use `Epidemic` to kill the `Tormented Dead` on <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror**.
*W7:* Do a `Pylon` at <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940> **Qadim the Peerless**.

🟡 **DPS (CC + G1)**
*W5:* Take `Green 1` at <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**.
*W7* Kill the `Wisps` at <:sabir:703930783160860722> **Sabir** and CC the `Anomalies` at <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940> **Qadim the Peerless**.

<:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Heal Alacrity (Tank + G3)**
*W5:* Tank on <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror** and <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**. Do `Green 3`.
*W6:* Tank on <:largos:703930782275731498> **Twin Largos** and <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.
*W7:* Tank on <:adina:703930780610461806> **Adina** and <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940> **Qadim the Peerless**.

🤎 **Heal Alacrity (Push + Kite + G2)**
*W5:* Push `Tormented Dead` on <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror** and take `Green 2` and kite the `Messengers` at <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**.

<:quick_dps:1176639849156051014> **Quick DPS (Off-Tank )**
*W5:* Tank on <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror**. 
*W6:* Tank at <:largos:703930782275731498> **Twin Largos** and take a `Wyvern` at <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.

Let me know if you have any questions!
